general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, and initiatives within Sharda University, covering academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and School of Nursing Science & Research, administrative reports such as Examination Annual Reports and university brochures, student support services including scholarships and career counseling, and administrative details like fee structures and tenders. It also highlights key aspects of the university's operations and student life, such as FM radio, mentoring portals, and global outreach initiatives.
